page.title: 18WHAT I DO IN MY HOLIDAYS.
page.content: In the Easter holidays, children can go to Howbury Grange Technical School. It is a kind of play scheme. It starts at half past ten and finishes at half past twelve. The afternoon time is from two o'clock until four o'clock andin the evening from six until eight o'clock. You can play badminton and table tennis and if you queue you can have a go on the trampoline. You can play football and run in relay races. Sometimes they have a Punch and Judy show and inflatable castles to bounce on. This costs 25p.
